dcterms:description: A dataset constructed by the authors for their experiments, allowing for the creation of parallel corpora across languages that differ only in the typological feature being investigated.
dcterms:title: Artificial Languages

dcterms:creator: Matthew S. Dryer
Martin Haspelmath
dcterms:description: A comprehensive database of structural properties of languages, providing typological data that has been used in various linguistic studies.
dcterms:title: World Atlas of Language Structures (WALS)

dcterms:creator: Shauli Ravfogel
Yoav Goldberg
Tal Linzen
dcterms:description: A dataset used to study the inductive biases of RNNs with synthetic variations of natural languages, focusing on language model performance across variations.
dcterms:title: The dataset used by Ravfogel et al. (2019)

dcterms:creator: Samuel R. Bowman
Christopher D. Manning
Christopher Potts
dcterms:description: A dataset used to investigate tree-structured composition in neural networks without tree-structured architectures.
dcterms:title: The dataset used by Bowman et al. (2015)

dcterms:creator: Ryan Cotterell
Sabrina J. Mielke
Jason Eisner
Brian Roark
dcterms:description: A dataset used to explore whether all languages are equally hard to language-model, contributing to the understanding of language model performance across different languages.
dcterms:title: The dataset used by Cotterell et al. (2018)

dcterms:creator: Sabrina J. Mielke
Ryan Cotterell
Kyle Gorman
Brian Roark
Jason Eisner
dcterms:description: A dataset used to investigate what kind of language is hard to language-model, providing insights into the challenges faced by language models.
dcterms:title: The dataset used by Mielke et al. (2019)
